original_title: Nevermore - Três Pesadelos e Um Delírio de Edgar Allan Poe
overview: A collection of three short stories and one poem by Edgar Allan Poe adapted for the screen. Berenice, Morella, The Raven and Ligea like never before seen on film. The movies explore the sensuality, the opium driven dreams and the horror which are the essence of Poe's works. A visually stunning work by the same makers of horror-indie-hit 'Morgue Story'.
title: Nevermore - Três Pesadelos e Um Delírio de Edgar Allan Poe
